```{r echo=FALSE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE, paged.print=FALSE, results="hide"}
m <- signif(runif(1, 1, 9.9), 2)
x <- sample(-12:2, 1)

ans <- 10 * log10(m * 10^(x + 12))

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = ans / 10, format = FALSE, digits = 0)
sc$questions <- sprintf("%s dB", sc$questions)
```

Question
========
What is the decibel level of a sound that has an intensity of $`r m` \times 10^{`r x`} \,\mathsf{W / m^2}$?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
The decibel level is

$$ 10 \cdot \log_{10}\left(\frac{`r m` \times 10^{`r x`}}{1 \times 10^{-12}} \right) = `r fmt(ans, 0)` \,\mathsf{dB} $$
